text:
The MyFirst staff, Mao, was patiently helping us with all requests. He is knowledgeable about the products and hassle free customer service experience.

Thank you MyFirst for the lucky draw prizes! The watches are so lovely and useful. Definitely recommended for young children. The watched provide not just convenience but added safety features (location tracking).
All the younger children should get one!
Great smartwatch for kids! Easy to use, fits well, and the GPS/call features give peace of mind. Fun camera and games too. Battery life is decent. App could be better, but overall very happy with it!
Was attended by staff Mao, very friendly and knowledgeable. He is very patient explaining the usage of watch. Thanks and will be back for future purchase
Guvitra is very nice and set up the watch for us, and explained to my kid patiently some basic instruction.

My wife came here to buy the watch for our daughter.
Vitra & Mao is friendly and helpful.
Overall good sales service.
